titles: The Tragedy of Phillis, complaining of the disloyall love of Amintas. To a new court tune.
publisher: Printed by E[lizabeth]. P[urslow]. for Francis Coles in Old-Bayley.,
notes: Two ballads, side by side. Includes "The complaint of the shepheard Harpalus. To a pleasant new tune."
Date of publication and printer's name suggested by Wing.
Imperfect: mutilated, affecting title of "The complaint of the shepheard Harpalus".
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
